blocks.name: rexunirn
blocks.content: Restricted existential quantification over the union of the range of a function. Cf. ~ rexrn and ~ eluni2 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexunirn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s1, cuni(crn(c2)), w0))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylbi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s1, cuni(crn(c2)), w0), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0)))))
  bitr4i(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0)))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s1, c1, w0))))
  df-rex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0))
  exbii(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s1, c1, w0)))
  bitr4i(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0))))
  19.42v(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s1, c1, w0), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0)))
  df-rex(s1, c1, w0)
  exlimiv(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0))), wrex(s1, cuni(crn(c2)), w0))
  sylibr(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0))), wrex(s1, cuni(crn(c2)), w0), wex(s1, wa(wrex(hs0, crn(c2), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), w0)))
  eximi(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0)), wa(wrex(hs0, crn(c2), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), w0))
  sylib(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0)), wa(wrex(hs0, crn(c2), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), w0), wrex(hs0, crn(c2), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)))
  sylan(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0), wrex(hs0, crn(c2), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)), wcel(c1, crn(c2)))
  mpdan(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, crn(c2)), wcel(c1, c3))
  elrnmpt1(s0, c0, c1, c3, c2)
  rspcev(hs0, c1, crn(c2), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))
  r19.41v(hs0, crn(c2), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)
  bitri(wrex(s1, cuni(crn(c2)), w0), wex(s1, wa(wrex(hs0, crn(c2), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), w0)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cuni(crn(c2))), w0)))
  df-rex(s1, cuni(crn(c2)), w0)
  exbii(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cuni(crn(c2))), w0), wa(wrex(hs0, crn(c2), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), w0))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s1), cuni(crn(c2))), w0, wrex(hs0, crn(c2), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  eluni2(hs0, cv(s1), crn(c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, cuni(crn(c2)), w0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, crn(c2))
  diff.crn.s(s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rexunirn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0))→ ∃(s1 ∈ ⋃ ran(c2), w0))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylbi(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0)), ∃(s1 ∈ ⋃ ran(c2), w0), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0)))))
  bitr4i(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0)), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0)))), ∃(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0))))
  df-rex(s0, c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0))
  exbii(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0))), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0)))
  bitr4i(∃(s1,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0))), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0)), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∃(s1,(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0))))
  19.42v(s1, s0 ∈ c0, (s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0))
  anbi2i(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0), ∃(s1,(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0)))
  df-rex(s1, c1, w0)
  exlimiv(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0))), ∃(s1 ∈ ⋃ ran(c2), w0))
  sylibr(∃(s1,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0))), ∃(s1 ∈ ⋃ ran(c2), w0), ∃(s1,(∃(hs0 ∈ ran(c2), s1 ∈ hs0)∧ w0)))
  eximi(s1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0)), (∃(hs0 ∈ ran(c2), s1 ∈ hs0)∧ w0))
  sylib((s0 ∈ c0 ∧(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0)), (∃(hs0 ∈ ran(c2), s1 ∈ hs0)∧ w0), ∃(hs0 ∈ ran(c2),(s1 ∈ hs0 ∧ w0)))
  sylan(s0 ∈ c0, (s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0), ∃(hs0 ∈ ran(c2),(s1 ∈ hs0 ∧ w0)), c1 ∈ ran(c2))
  mpdan(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ran(c2), c1 ∈ c3)
  elrnmpt1(s0, c0, c1, c3, c2)
  rspcev(hs0, c1, ran(c2), (s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0), (s1 ∈ hs0 ∧ w0))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c1, s1 ∈ hs0, w0, s1 ∈ c1)
  eleq2(hs0, c1, s1)
  r19.41v(hs0, ran(c2), s1 ∈ hs0, w0)
  bitri(∃(s1 ∈ ⋃ ran(c2), w0), ∃(s1,(∃(hs0 ∈ ran(c2), s1 ∈ hs0)∧ w0)), ∃(s1,(s1 ∈ ⋃ ran(c2)∧ w0)))
  df-rex(s1, ⋃ ran(c2), w0)
  exbii(s1, (s1 ∈ ⋃ ran(c2)∧ w0), (∃(hs0 ∈ ran(c2), s1 ∈ hs0)∧ w0))
  anbi1i(s1 ∈ ⋃ ran(c2), w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ran(c2), s1 ∈ hs0))
  eluni2(hs0, s1, ran(c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, ⋃ ran(c2), w0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, ran(c2))
  diff.crn.s(s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(ran(c2))
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ∈ c1 ∧ w0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
}
